attributes.action: take measures and lobby other national leaders to curb global warming to a greater degree than you are presently doing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The IPCC has now said that mankind is the most likely cause of global warming.  We believe that greater efforts at national level should be taken to promote home insulation, renewable energy, R&D into improving renewable sources, decentralisation of generating sources and micro-generation.  It is understood that this MAY involve development of nuclear power but this should be minimised for the benefit of future generations
